message.name: ERR_PT_PI_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_DELETE_FROM_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template plan item approval criteria cannot be deleted from a canceled plan template.
The plan template plan item approval criteria cannot be deleted from a cancelled plan template.

message.name: ERR_PT_PI_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_ADD_TO_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template plan item approval criteria cannot be assigned to a canceled plan template.
The plan template plan item approval criteria cannot be assigned to a cancelled plan template.

message.name: ERR_PT_PI_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_MODIFY_TO_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template plan item approval criteria cannot be modified on a canceled plan template.
The plan template plan item approval criteria cannot be modified on a cancelled plan template.
